_header: The head of the crow that token call we
_description: A fragment of an alchemical poem, perhaps a summary of Ripley’s Twelve Gates — three stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar486.First Lines:
The hed of þe crow þat token call weand some men callest
                    þe crowes bill…
BLHar486.Last Lines:
…and gattes hathe yt a xj moone is gonquirid now to þe
                    second goo
